Class_Quest_Name_A Game of Life and Deat: A Game of Life and Death
Class_Quest_Name_Once Upon a Time in Dom: Once Upon a Time in Doma
Class_Skill_Desc_Aeolian Edge: Delivers an attack with a potency of 220.</br>280 when executed from a target's rear.</br>Combo Action: Gust Slash</br>Combo Potency: 400</br>Rear Combo Potency: 460</br>Potencies are increased by 100 while under the effect of Kazematoi.</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Ninki Gauge by 15
Class_Skill_Desc_Aetherial Manipulation: Rush to a target's side.</br>Unable to cast if bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Arm's Length: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Additional Effect: When you are struck by a physical attack, the striker will be afflicted with Slow +20%</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Armor Crush: Delivers an attack with a potency of 240.</br>300 when executed from a target's flank.</br>Combo Action: Gust Slash</br>Combo Potency: 440</br>Flank Combo Potency: 500</br>Combo Bonus: Grants 2 stacks of Kazematoi</br>Kazematoi Effect: Increases potency of Aeolian Edge by 100</br>Maximum Stacks: 5</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Ninki Gauge by 15
Class_Skill_Desc_Assassinate: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Class_Skill_Desc_Backstep L: Jump 10 yalms back from current position. Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Banner of Firm Resolve: Storm the field under the Banner of Firm Resolve, gaining additional stacks each time damage is taken, up to a maximum of 5.</br>Banner of Firm Resolve Effect: Reduces damage dealt by 15% per stack</br>Duration: 30s</br>At maximum stacks, take up the Banner of Unyielding Defense.</br>Banner of Unyielding Defense Effect: Reduces damage taken by 30%</br>Duration: 180s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other Banner actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Banner of Honed Acuity: Storm the field under the Banner of Honed Acuity, gaining additional stacks each time an attack is evaded, up to a maximum of 3.</br>Banner of Honed Acuity Effect: Increases damage taken by 10% per stack</br>Duration: 120s</br>At maximum stacks, take up the Banner of Transcendent Finesse.</br>Banner of Transcendent Finesse Effect: Increases critical hit rate by 30% and reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 20%</br>Duration: 180s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other Banner actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Banner of Honored Sacri: Storm the field under the Banner of Honored Sacrifice, increasing damage dealt by 55% while draining your HP.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other Banner actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Banner of Noble Ends: Storm the field under the Banner of Noble Ends, increasing damage dealt by 50% while reducing own HP recovery via most healing actions by 100%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other Banner actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Banner of Solemn Clarit: Storm the field under the Banner of Solemn Clarity, periodically gaining additional stacks, up to a maximum of 4.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.</br>At maximum stacks, take up the Banner of Limitless Grace.</br>Banner of Limitless Grace Effect: Increases healing potency by 50% while reducing MP cost</br>Duration: 120s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other Banner actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bhavacakra: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 400.</br>Meisui Bonus: Potency is increased to 550 when under the effect of Meisui</br>Ninki Gauge Cost: 50</br>Shares a recast timer with Hellfrog Medium.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bladedance: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,250.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bloodbath: Converts a portion of physical damage dealt into HP.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Bloodbath L: Converts a portion of damage dealt into HP.</br>Duration: 45s
Class_Skill_Desc_Braver: Delivers an attack with a potency of 2,400.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bunshin: Grants 5 stacks of Bunshin, each stack allowing your shadow to attack enemies each time you execute a weaponskill. Shadow attack potency varies based on the attack executed, but is not affected by combo bonuses.</br>Melee Attack Potency: 160</br>Ranged Attack Potency: 160</br>Area Attack Potency: 80</br>Ninki Gauge increases by 5 each time your shadow lands an attack.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Phantom Kamaitachi Ready</br>Duration: 45s</br>Ninki Gauge Cost: 50
Class_Skill_Desc_Catastrophe L: Deals unaspected damage to all nearby enemies with a potency of 4,000, while dealing damage with a potency of 999,999 to self.
Class_Skill_Desc_Chi: Make the ritual mudra hand gesture for “earth.”</br>Duration: 6s</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>Conversely, execution of weaponskills triggers the cooldown of this action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Cure L III: Restores own or target party member's HP and all party members nearby target.</br>Cure Potency: 9,000
Class_Skill_Desc_Death Blossom: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5
Class_Skill_Desc_Death L: KOs target. The less the target's HP, the greater the chance of success.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deathfrog Medium: Deals fire damage with a potency of 260 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Ninki Gauge Cost: 50</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Higi.</br>Shares a recast timer with Bhavacakra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Hellfrog Medium changes to Deathfrog Medium when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deep Essence of the Bea: Increases defense by 60% and maximum HP by 54%.</br>Additional Effect: Absorb a portion of damage dealt as HP</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deep Essence of the Bre: Increases poison resistance and movement speed, including mount speed, and increases evasion by 20%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deep Essence of the Pla: Increases defense by 96% and maximum HP by 54%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deep Essence of the Sav: Increases healing potency by 72%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deep Essence of the Ski: Increases damage dealt by 24% and critical hit rate by 18%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Deep Essence of the Wat: Reduces maximum HP by 3% while increasing evasion by 48%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Dispel L: Removes one beneficial status from target.
Class_Skill_Desc_Dokumori: Delivers an attack to all enemies in a cone before you with a potency of 300.</br>Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 5%</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: Increases the chance of additional items being dropped by target if Dokumori is dealt before, or as, the finishing blow</br>Additional Effect: Increases Ninki Gauge by 40</br>Additional Effect: Grants Higi</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Doton: Creates a patch of corrupted earth, dealing damage with a potency of 80 to any enemies who enter.</br>Duration: 18s</br>Additional Effect: Heavy +40%</br>Mudra Combination: Ten→Jin→Chi or Jin→Ten→Chi</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Ninjutsu changes to Doton when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Double Edge L: Increases physical damage dealt while dealing damage to self over time.</br>Stacks increase every 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 16. For each stack, physical damage dealt is increased by 15%, and potency of damage dealt to self increases by 360.</br>Duration: 48s
Class_Skill_Desc_Dream Within a Dream: Delivers a threefold attack, each hit with a potency of 180.
Class_Skill_Desc_Essence of the Beast: Increases defense by 50% and maximum HP by 45%.</br>Additional Effect: Absorb a portion of damage dealt as HP</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Essence of the Breathta: Increases poison resistance and movement speed, including mount speed, and increases evasion by 10%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Essence of the Platebea: Increases defense by 80% and maximum HP by 45%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Essence of the Savior: Increases healing potency by 60%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Essence of the Skirmish: Increases damage dealt by 20% and critical hit rate by 15%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Essence of the Watcher: Reduces maximum HP by 5% while increasing evasion by 40%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence or Deep Essence actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Esuna L: Removes a single detrimental effect from target.
Class_Skill_Desc_Feint: Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 10% and magic damage dealt by 5%.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Fleeting Raiju: Deals lightning damage with a potency of 700.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Raiju Ready.
Class_Skill_Desc_Focus L: Grants a stack of Boost, up to a maximum of 16.</br>Boost Bonus: Increases potency of next weaponskill by 30% per stack</br>Duration: 30s</br>Shares a recast timer with all other weaponskills and spells.
Class_Skill_Desc_Forked Raiju: Rushes target and delivers a lightning attack with a potency of 700.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Raiju Ready.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Fuma Shuriken: Delivers a ranged ninjutsu attack with a potency of 500.</br>Mudra Combination: Any one of the Ten, Chi, or Jin mudra</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Ninjutsu changes to Fuma Shuriken when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Goka Mekkyaku: Deals fire damage with a potency of 600 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Mudra Combination: Chi→Ten or Jin→Ten</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Kassatsu.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Ninjutsu changes to Goka Mekkyaku when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Gust Slash: Delivers an attack with a potency of 240.</br>Combo Action: Spinning Edge</br>Combo Potency: 400</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5
Class_Skill_Desc_Hakke Mujinsatsu: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.</br>Combo Action: Death Blossom</br>Combo Potency: 120</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5
Class_Skill_Desc_Hellfrog Medium: Deals fire damage with a potency of 160 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Ninki Gauge Cost: 50</br>Shares a recast timer with Bhavacakra.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hide: Blend in with your surroundings, making it impossible for most enemies to detect you, but reducing movement speed by 50%. Has no effect on enemies 10 levels higher than your own, or certain enemies with special sight.</br>Additional Effect: Restores 2 charges to all mudra</br>The effect of Doton ends upon execution of Hide.</br>Cannot be executed while in combat.</br>Effect ends upon use of any action other than Sprint, or upon reuse of Hide.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hollow Nozuchi: All enemies standing in the corrupted earth of Doton take additional earth damage with a potency of 70.</br>Requires Hakke Mujinsatsu to be executed as a combo action or upon executing Katon, Goka Mekkyaku, or Phantom Kamaitachi.</br>Effect can only be triggered while Doton is active.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Huton: Deals fire damage with a potency of 240 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Shadow Walker</br>Shadow Walker Effect: Allows execution of actions which require the effect of Hidden, without being under that effect</br>Duration: 20s</br>Mudra Combination: Jin→Chi→Ten or Chi→Jin→Ten</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Ninjutsu changes to Huton when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hyosho Ranryu: Deals ice damage with a potency of 1,300.</br>Mudra Combination: Ten→Jin or Chi→Jin</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Kassatsu.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Ninjutsu changes to Hyosho Ranryu when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hyoton: Deals ice damage with a potency of 350.</br>Additional Effect: Bind</br>Duration: 15s</br>Mudra Combination: Ten→Jin or Chi→Jin</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Ninjutsu changes to Raiton when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Incense L: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list and increasing enmity generation.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Jin: Make the ritual mudra hand gesture for “man.”</br>Duration: 6s</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>Conversely, execution of weaponskills triggers the cooldown of this action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Kassatsu: Allows the execution of a single ninjutsu without consumption of mudra charges.</br>Additional Effect: Increases damage for the next ninjutsu action by 30%</br>Duration: 15s</br>Recast timer of mudra is not affected by the execution of this action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Katon: Deals fire damage with a potency of 350 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Mudra Combination: Chi→Ten or Jin→Ten</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Ninjutsu changes to Katon when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Kunai's Bane: Deals damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 600.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Kunai's Bane</br>Kunai's Bane Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 10%</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while Hidden.
Class_Skill_Desc_Light Curtain: Grants the effect of Lost Reflect to self.</br>Lost Reflect Effect: Reflects most magic attacks</br>Duration: 10s</br>Shares a recast timer with all other weaponskills and spells.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lodestone: Instantly return to the starting point of the area.</br>Cannot be executed while in combat.</br>Shares a recast timer with all other weaponskills and spells.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Assassination: Delivers a close-quarter attack with a potency of 350. Chance of instant KO when attacking from the rear, which increases the lower the target's HP.</br>Spirit of the Beast Effect: Grants the effect of Lost Font of Power to self</br>Lost Font of Power Effect: Increases damage dealt by 30% and critical hit rate by 40%</br>Duration: 18s</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Furthermore, the recast timer cannot be affected by other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Bravery: Increases damage dealt by an ally or self by 5%.</br>Duration: 600s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Bubble: Increases maximum HP of self or target player by 30%.</br>Duration: 600s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Cure II: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 21,700</br>Spirit of the Savior Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 6,000</br>Duration: 21s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Cure III: Restores own or target party member's HP and all party members nearby target.</br>Cure Potency: 15,000
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Cure IV: Restores own or target party member's HP and all party members nearby target.</br>Cure Potency: 21,700</br>Spirit of the Savior Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 6,000</br>Duration: 21s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Death: KOs target. The less the target's HP, the greater the chance of success.</br>Spirit of the Ordained Effect: Chance of success is increased</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Furthermore, the recast timer cannot be affected by other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Dispel: Removes one beneficial status from target.</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Excellence: Instantly cures Weakness and temporarily nullifies most attacks, while increasing damage dealt by 65%. Memorable will be applied when effect ends.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Memorable Effect: Increases damage dealt by 65% while decreasing damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 50s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Fair Trade: Through sheer force of will, restore a random technique of the lost to physical form and throw it at a single target, dealing damage with a potency of 50.</br>Potency increases up to 1,000 based on the weight of the lost action.</br>The lost action thrown will be lost upon execution.</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Furthermore, the recast timer cannot be affected by other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Focus: Grants a stack of Boost, up to a maximum of 16.</br>Boost Bonus: Increases potency of next weaponskill by 15% per stack</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect ends upon using another lost action.</br>Shares a recast timer with all other weaponskills and spells.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Font of Power: Increases damage dealt by 30% and critical hit rate by 40%.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Spirit of the Irregular Effect: Damage bonus effect is increased to 40%</br>Spirit of the Platebearer Effect: Grants Solid Shield to self</br>Solid Shield Effect: Reduces physical damage taken by 50%</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Font of Skill: Resets the recast timer for most actions and role actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Impetus: Quickly dash 10 yalms forward.</br>Additional Effect: Applies Lost Swift to self and nearby party members</br>Lost Swift Effect: Greatly increases movement speed</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other movement speed enhancing abilities.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Spirit of the Breathtaker Effect: Increases evasion of self and nearby party members by 15%</br>Duration: 60s</br>Spirit of the Watcher Effect: Grants Rapid Recast to self and nearby party members</br>Rapid Recast Effect: Shortens recast time for next ability used by 25%</br>Effect only applies to certain abilities.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Incense: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list. </br>Additional Effect: Enmity generation is increased and damage taken is reduced by 20%</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Manawall: Temporarily applies Heavy to self, while reducing damage taken by 90% and nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 6s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Paralyze III: Afflicts target and all nearby enemies with Paralysis.</br>Duration: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Perception: Detect traps within a radius of 15 yalms.</br>If there are no traps within 15 yalms, alerts you to the presence of traps with a radius of 36 yalms.</br>※This action can only be used in Delubrum Reginae.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Protect: Applies a barrier to self or target player reducing physical damage taken by 10%.</br>Duration: 30m
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Protect II: Applies a barrier to self or target player reducing physical damage taken by 15%.</br>Duration: 30m
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Rampage: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Interrupts all nearby enemies</br>Additional Effect: Increases damage taken by enemies with Physical Aversion by 10%</br>Duration: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Reflect: Creates a barrier around self or party member that reflects most magic attacks.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Spirit of the Guardian Effect: Duration is increased to 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Rend Armor: Delivers a jumping attack with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 10%.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Reraise: Grants the effect of Reraise to self or target player.</br>Reraise Effect: Grants an 80% chance of automatic revival upon KO</br>Duration: 180m
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Sacrifice: Restores all of a KO'd target's HP.</br>Cannot be executed if currently afflicted with Sacrifice.</br>Additional Effect: Inflicts Sacrifice on self</br>Sacrifice Effect: When effect expires, you will be KO'd</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Shell: Applies a barrier to self or target player reducing magic damage taken by 10%.</br>Duration: 30m
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Shell II: Applies a barrier to self or target player reducing magic damage taken by 15%.</br>Duration: 30m
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Slash: Delivers an attack with a potency of 800 to all enemies in a cone before you. When critical damage is dealt, potency is tripled.</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Furthermore, the recast timer cannot be affected by other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Spellforge: Grants the effect of Lost Spellforge to self or target ally.</br>Lost Spellforge Effect: All attacks deal magic damage. However, all bonuses to damage dealt are determined by the attack's base damage type.</br>Duration: 300s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Lost Steelsting.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Steelsting: Grants the effect of Lost Steelsting to self or target ally.</br>Lost Steelsting Effect: All attacks deal physical damage. However, all bonuses to damage dealt are determined by the attack's base damage type.</br>Duration: 300s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Lost Spellforge.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Stoneskin: Applies a barrier to self or target player that absorbs damage totaling 15% of target's maximum HP.</br>Duration: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Stoneskin II: Creates a barrier around self and all party members near you that absorbs damage totaling 10% of maximum HP.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lost Swift: Greatly increases movement speed.</br>Effect cannot be stacked with other movement speed enhancing abilities.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Spirit of the Breathtaker Effect: Increases evasion by 30%</br>Duration: 60s</br>Spirit of the Watcher Effect: Grants Rapid Recast to self</br>Rapid Recast Effect: Shortens recast time for next ability used by 60%</br>Effect only applies to certain abilities.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Meisui: Dispels Shadow Walker, increasing the Ninki Gauge by 50.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Meisui</br>Duration: 30s</br>Meisui Effect: Increases the potency of Zesho Meppo to 850 and Bhavacakra to 550Increases the potency of Bhavacakra to 550</br>Can only be executed while in combat and under the effect of Shadow Walker.
Class_Skill_Desc_Mimic: Study the lost techniques used by a targeted ally and make them your own.</br>Cannot be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Mug: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150.</br>Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 5%</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: Increases the chance of additional items being dropped by target if Mug is dealt before, or as, the finishing blow
Class_Skill_Desc_Ninjutsu: Executes a specific ninjutsu action coinciding with the combination of mudra made immediately beforehand.</br>If any other action is used before the mudra are combined and the ninjutsu executed, Ninjutsu will fail.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>Conversely, execution of weaponskills triggers the cooldown of this action.</br>Restores 2 charges to all mudra when Hide is executed while outside of combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Aeolian Edge: Delivers an attack with a potency of 7,000.</br>Combo Action: Gust Slash</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Assassinate: Delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000.</br>Ignores the effects of Guard when dealing damage.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Hidden.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Bloodbath: Converts 100% of physical damage dealt into HP.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Bunshin: Grants 5 stacks of Bunshin, each stack allowing your shadow to attack enemies each time you execute a weaponskill.</br>Bunshin Potency: 4,000</br>Potency is halved when executing Fuma Shuriken, Zesho Meppo, Forked Raiju, or Fleeting Raiju.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: Creates a shadow that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 8,000 potency</br>Duration: 10s</br>※Action changes to Huton while under the effect of Three Mudra.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Dokumori: Delivers an attack with a potency of 2,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 8s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Zesho Meppo Ready</br>Duration: 10s</br>※Action changes to Goka Mekkyaku while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※Aeolian Edge Combo changes to Zesho Meppo while under the effect of Zesho Meppo Ready.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Doton: Creates a patch of corrupted earth under your feet, dealing damage with a potency of 3,000 to any enemies who enter.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Reduces damage taken by 15% while standing in the patch of salted earth</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Fleeting Raiju: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 2s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Fleeting Raiju Ready.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Forked Raiju: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 2s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Fleeting Raiju Ready</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※Aeolian Edge Combo changes to Fleeting Raiju while under the effect of Fleeting Raiju Ready.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Fuma Shuriken: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 8,000.</br>Maximum Charges: 3</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.</br>※Action changes to Hyosho Ranryu while under the effect of Three Mudra.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Goka Mekkyaku: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 4,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 4,000</br>Duration: 12s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Gust Slash: Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000.</br>Combo Action: Spinning Edge</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Hollow Nozuchi: All enemies standing in the corrupted earth of Doton take additional earth damage with a potency of 3,000.</br>Requires the execution of a weaponskill, Hyosho Ranryu, or Goka Mekkyaku.</br>Additional Effect: Heavy +75%</br>Duration: 3s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Huton: Grants Huton, creating a barrier that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 16,000 potency.</br>While barrier is active, reduces weaponskill recast time by 20%, and increases movement speed by 25%.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Movement speed returns to normal when barrier is completely absorbed.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Hyosho Ranryu: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 16,000.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Meisui: Restores own or target party member's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 8,000</br>Additional Effect: Grants healing over time effect to target</br>Cure Potency: 4,000</br>Duration: 12s</br>Additional Effect: Nullifies one status affliction that can be removed by Purify</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Seiton Tenchu: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000, incapacitating foes whose HP is below 50%.</br>Ignores the effects of Guard when dealing damage.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Death Link</br>Duration: 2s</br>Defeating an enemy with this action, or one under the effect of Death Link, will grant Unsealed Seiton Tenchu, allowing a second execution of this action.</br>Duration: 8s</br>Effect duration is reduced by 1s each time it is applied to a target with a minimum duration of 4s.</br>Effect cannot be applied to players riding machina or non-player combatants.</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full or while under the effect of Unsealed Seiton Tenchu.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 90s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Shukuchi: Move quickly to the specified location.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Hidden</br>Hidden Effect: Blend in with your surroundings, making it impossible for enemies to see or target you</br>Duration: 4s</br>Effect ends upon use of any action or upon taking damage from an enemy.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※Action changes to Doton while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※Aeolian Edge Combo changes to Assassinate while under the effect of Hidden.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Smite: Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000.</br>Potency increases up to 18,000 as the target's HP decreases, reaching its maximum value when the target has 25% HP or less.</br>Recast time resets upon earning a kill or an assist.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Spinning Edge: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Swift: Increases movement speed by 100% and grants immunity to Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Half-asleep, Sleep, Deep Freeze, and knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 4s</br>Effect ends when riding a mount.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Three Mudra: Grants Three Mudra, allowing for immediate execution of any ninjutsu action. However, the same ninjutsu action cannot be executed consecutively.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>※Action changes to Meisui while under the effect of Three Mudra.</br>※All actions except Seiton Tenchu will change to their respective ninjutsu actions while under the effect of Three Mudra.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Zesho Meppo: Delivers a fourfold attack, each hit with a potency of 2,000.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Zesho Meppo Ready.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Paralyze L III: Afflicts target and all neaby enemies with Paralysis.</br>Duration: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_Perception L: Reveals all traps within a 15-yalm radius. If no traps exist within 15 yalms, detects whether any traps are present within a 36-yalm radius.</br>Only effective within dungeons.
Class_Skill_Desc_Phantom Kamaitachi: Your shadow deals wind damage to target and all enemies within 5 yalms with a potency of 600.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Ninki Gauge by 10</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Phantom Kamaitachi Ready.
Class_Skill_Desc_Pure Essence of the Due: Increases defense by 60%, damage dealt by 60%, and maximum HP by 81%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence, Deep Essence, or Pure Essence actions.</br>It is said that Pure Essences may grant unexpected effects...</br>※This action can only be used in Delubrum Reginae.
Class_Skill_Desc_Pure Essence of the Gam: Increases evasion by 11%, critical hit rate by 77%, and direct hit rate by 77%.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.</br>Cannot be used with other Essence, Deep Essence, or Pure Essence actions.</br>It is said that Pure Essences may grant unexpected effects...</br>※This action can only be used in Delubrum Reginae.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rabbit Medium: Thumpity thump thump, thumpity thump thump...
Class_Skill_Desc_Raise L: Resurrects target to a weakened state.
Class_Skill_Desc_Raiton: Deals lightning damage with a potency of 740.</br>Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Raiju Ready</br>Duration: 30s</br>Maximum Stacks: 3</br>Effect of Raiju Ready ends upon execution of any melee weaponskill.</br>Mudra Combination: Ten→Chi or Jin→Chi</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Ninjutsu changes to Raiton when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rapid Recast L: Shortens recast time for next ability used by 50%.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Reflect L: Creates a magic-reflecting barrier around self or party member.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Rejuvenate L: Instantly restores 50% of maximum HP and MP.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Elixir: Restores own HP and MP to maximum.</br>Shares a recast timer with Resistance Potion and Dynamis Dice.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Ether Kit: Grants Auto-ether to self.</br>Auto-ether Effect: Restores MP automatically when MP falls below 20%</br>Duration: 600s</br>When triggered, there is a 50% chance the effect will end.</br>Spirit of the Breathtaker Effect: Chance for Auto-ether effect to end is reduced to 10%</br>Shares a recast timer with Resistance Potion Kit and Resistance Medikit.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Medikit: Removes a single detrimental effect from self. When not suffering from detrimental effects, creates a barrier that protects against most status ailments. The barrier is removed after curing the next status ailment suffered.</br>Effect cannot be stacked with similar barrier actions.</br>Duration: 30m</br>Shares a recast timer with Resistance Potion Kit and Resistance Ether Kit.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Phoenix: Resurrects target to a weakened state.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Potion: Gradually restores HP.</br>Cure Potency: 1,600</br>Duration: 40s</br>Shares a recast timer with Dynamis Dice and Resistance Elixir.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Potion Kit: Grants Auto-potion to self.</br>Auto-potion Effect: Restores HP automatically when HP falls below 50%</br>Duration: 600s</br>When triggered, there is a 50% chance the effect will end.</br>Spirit of the Breathtaker Effect: Chance for Auto-potion effect to end is reduced to 10%</br>Shares a recast timer with Resistance Ether Kit and Resistance Medikit.
Class_Skill_Desc_Resistance Reraiser: Grants a 70% chance of automatic revival upon KO.</br>Duration: 180m
Class_Skill_Desc_Shade Shift: Create shadows that nullify damage up to 20% of maximum HP.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Shukuchi: Move quickly to the specified location.</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Spinning Edge: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5
Class_Skill_Desc_Spirit Dart L: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Spirit Dart L, increasing damage taken by 8%</br>Duration: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_Spirit of the Remembere: Increases maximum HP by 10% and accuracy by 30%.</br>Additional Effect: Grants a 70% chance of automatic revival upon KO</br>Duration: 180m
Class_Skill_Desc_Stoneskin L: Creates a barrier around target that absorbs damage totaling 10% of target's maximum HP.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Suiton: Deals water damage with a potency of 580.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Shadow Walker</br>Shadow Walker Effect: Allows execution of actions which require the effect of Hidden, without being under that effect</br>Duration: 20s</br>Mudra Combination: Ten→Chi→Jin or Chi→Ten→Jin</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Ninjutsu changes to Suiton when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Ten: Make the ritual mudra hand gesture for “heaven.”</br>Duration: 6s</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills, mudra, and Ninjutsu upon execution.</br>Conversely, execution of weaponskills triggers the cooldown of this action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Ten Chi Jin: Temporarily converts each of the three mudra into a ninjutsu action. Executing one of these actions will convert the remaining mudra into different ninjutsu actions until all three have been executed or the Ten Chi Jin effect expires.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Tenri Jindo Ready</br>Duration: 30s</br>Only ninjutsu available while active. The same ninjutsu cannot be executed twice.</br>Cannot be executed while under the effect of Kassatsu.
Class_Skill_Desc_Tenri Jindo: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 1,100.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Tenri Jindo Ready.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Ten Chi Jin changes to Tenri Jindo when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Skill_Desc_Throwing Dagger: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 200.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5
Class_Skill_Desc_Trick Attack: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.</br>400 when executed from a target's rear.</br>Additional Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 10%</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Hidden.
Class_Skill_Desc_True North: Nullifies all action direction requirements.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Skill_Desc_Wisdom of the Breathtak: Increases poison resistance and movement speed, including mount speed, and increases evasion by 10%.</br>Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.</br>Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Wisdom of the Duelist: Increases physical damage dealt by 40% and maximum HP by 15%.</br>Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.</br>Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Wisdom of the Irregular: Increases damage dealt by 30% while reducing magic defense by 60%.</br>Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.</br>Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Wisdom of the Platebear: Reduces damage taken by 80% while increasing maximum HP by 50%.</br>Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.</br>Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Wisdom of the Skirmishe: Increases damage dealt by 20%.</br>Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.</br>Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Zesho Meppo: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 700.</br>Meisui Bonus: Potency is increased to 850</br>Ninki Gauge Cost: 50</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Higi.</br>Shares a recast timer with Hellfrog Medium.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Bhavacakra changes to Zesho Meppo when requirements for execution are met.
Class_Status_Desc_Bloodbath: Attacks generate HP equal to the amount of physical damage dealt.
Class_Status_Desc_Bunshin: Your corporeal shadow is performing an attack each time you execute a weaponskill.
Class_Status_Desc_Feint: Sustaining increased damage from target who executed Feint.
Class_Status_Desc_Huton: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage. Weaponskill cast and recast times are reduced while movement speed is increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Kunai's Bane: Sustaining increased damage from target who executed Kunai's Bane.
Class_Status_Desc_Swift: All Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Half-asleep, Sleep, Deep Freeze, knockback, and draw-in effects are nullified. Movement speed is also greatly increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Three Mudra: Able to execute any ninjutsu action.
Class_Status_Desc_Trick Attack: Damage taken from the ninja who applied this effect is increased.
Class_Trait_Desc_Adept Assassination: Upgrades Assassinate to Dream Within a Dream.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Kassatsu: Upgrades Katon and Hyoton to Goka Mekkyaku and Hyosho Ranryu while under the effect of Kassatsu.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Meisui: Increases the potency of Bhavacakra to 500 while under the effect of Meisui.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Raiton: Grants a stack of Raiju Ready upon executing Raiton.</br>Maximum Stacks: 3</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect of Raiju Ready ends upon execution of any melee weaponskill.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Shukuchi: Resets the recast timer for Shukuchi upon executing Katon, Raiton, or Hyoton on most targets.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Shukuchi II: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of  Shukuchi.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Ten Chi Jin: Grants Tenri Jindo Ready upon executing Ten Chi Jin.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Ten Chi Jin changes to Tenri Jindo while under the effect of Tenri Jindo Ready.
Class_Trait_Desc_Increase Attack Speed: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 15%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Melee Mastery: Increases the potency of Gust Slash to 120, Aeolian Edge to 140, and Armor Crush to 140.
Class_Trait_Desc_Melee Mastery II: Increases the potency of Spinning Edge to 220, Gust Slash to 160, and Throwing Dagger to 200.
Class_Trait_Desc_Melee Mastery III: Increases the potency of Spinning Edge to 300, Gust Slash to 240, Aeolian Edge to 220, Fuma Shuriken to 500, Raiton to 740, Suiton to 580, Armor Crush to 240, Bhavacakra to 400, Bhavacakra while under the effect of Meisui to 550, Forked Raiju to 700, and Fleeting Raiju to 700.
Class_Trait_Desc_Shukiho: Increases Ninki Gauge by 5 upon successfully landing certain weaponskills or completing certain combos.
Class_Trait_Desc_Shukiho II: Increases Ninki Gauge by 10 upon successfully completing a combo with Aeolian Edge or Armor Crush.
Class_Trait_Desc_Shukiho III: Increases Ninki Gauge by 15 upon successfully completing a combo with Aeolian Edge or Armor Crush.
Class_Trait_Desc_Trick Attack Mastery: Upgrades Trick Attack to Kunai's Bane.
